job_description:
• Strong background in QA and/or software engineering with solid analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Experience with modern delivery stacks (CI/CD) and test automation frameworks.
• Previous experience working with contract manufacturing environments.
• Excellent communication skills with the ability to lead cross-functional quality reviews.
• This enables us to remember your preferences (for example, your choice of language or region) or when you register on areas of the Sites, such as our web programs or extranets.
• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field preferred.
• Collaborate closely with functional teams in the hardware group, board designers, signal integrity engineers, ASIC, and software teams.
• Validate AMD’s latest networking SoC production and deliver test packages to contract manufacturing.
